content: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I can help you schedule HVAC, plumbing, or electrical services. May I please have your name to get started?
Thank you, Judy! Can you please provide your address so I can check if you’re in our service area?
Thanks! What kind of service do you need help with? We offer HVAC, electrical, and plumbing.
HVAC. My AC stopped working, I think.
Sorry to hear about your AC! When would you ideally like us to come out and take a look?
Actually, I might have to wait. My insurance company said they might cover fixing it, but they have to approve it first.
That makes sense, Judy. Would you like me to follow up with you later, or would you prefer to reach out when your insurance approves the repair?
I think I’ll just wait and call back when I know. Thank you though.
Thank you for letting me know, Judy. Feel free to reach out anytime when you’re ready to schedule. Wishing you a quick approval from your insurance!
reason: Customer declined to schedule, awaiting insurance.
